short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Da-xn Island Companion Extension allows you to perform site actions quickly and easily without having to go to the website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the new Da-xn Island Extension you can experience Da-xn Island like never before with brand new features and quick access to most site features including new ones!

Please also note the Da-xn Island Extension is in very early access and will not have all of the features to begin with but in the next few days we will start adding them in new patches!

At the moment the Da-xn Island Extension includes:

> User searching

> Da-xn Island quick url (Access part of Da-xn Island easily through one click and find our social media)

> Daily updates


Patch notes:

--------- What's new: 1.0.2 ---------
- Updated design
- A few bug fixes
- New fonts
